topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Upgrading Ceph Cluster

body.p: This page describes the upgrade operations of Ceph cluster and Ceph client.

Perform the following steps to upgrade:
Login to deployer node.
Execute the following playbook to upgrade Ceph cluster:cd ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts hlm-upgrade.yml

ol.li:
Execute the following commandceph -s
The above command should report the health status as HEALTH_OK.

Verify the Ceph version by logging on the Monitor and/or OSD node(s) and executing following command:ceph --version
The above command should return the version string of the latest package installed on the system. (any example, would be good??)
